question: Project UDAAN from Government of India:
option1: facilitates free online resources to girl students for preparation of engineering entrance examination
option2: aims at providing practical training to 10+2 Vocational pass outs in various industrial establishments
option3: aims to provide free education to physically handicapped students in various government institutions
option4: envisages to make school books accessible in digital form as e-books to be read and used on tablets and laptops
answer: facilitates free online resources to girl students for preparation of engineering entrance examination
explanation: Project UDAAN facilitates free online resources to girl students for preparation of engineering entrance examination
